play.libs.ws

Interface WSRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StandaloneWSRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AhcWSRequest

    public interface WSRequest
extends StandaloneWSRequest
    An enhanced WSRequest that can use Play specific classes.

        WSRequest setContentType(java.lang.String contentType)
        Set the content type. If the request body is a String, and no charset parameter is included, then it will default to UTF-8.
